TopicTitle: Parts no longer nestling within one another

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Following the upgrade to 1.0 I have found I am no longer able to get parts to nestle within each other in either the VAB or SPH.

While not a major issue, this does mean for example you cannot sit a cupola module on the side of fuel tank or nestle a OKTO2 inside the end of an XL Girder segment.

Regards

Earl822

i've had this also, sometimes it will be as simple as putting a circular battery module on a rocket and a fuel tank not clicking into place under it. Other times parts will click into place 'inside' another part but it won't take onboard its resources nor sit outside the part properly. It's pretty annoying

Pictures?

Also, try the offset tool or alt + F12 part clipping (the bottom two)
Managed to do what I wanted using the offset tool. Cheers!
